column4: Hi. I'm getting a permission denied from a .run file, actually from a lot of them (from a game server). they're all 0777 so I can't seem to reason the problem. I tried root, ./name.run and sh name.run
are they binary files or shell scripts?
pbsetup.run: ELF 32-bit LSB executable, Intel 80386, version 1 (SYSV), for GNU/Linux 2.2.5, dynamically linked (uses shared libs), stripped
hrm... run ldd on it, do you get any libraries that aren't matched up?
